## 📋 **Acceptance Criteria**

- [ ] Steps to reproduce are clear

## 🚨 **Severity**
- [ ] **Critical:** Site unusable, security issue
- [ ] **High:** Major functionality broken
- [ ] **Medium:** Minor functionality affected
- [ ] **Low:** Cosmetic issue, minor inconvenience

- [ ] Affects specific user group
